DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether treatment BMS-914392 safe , well tolerate associate reduction atrial fibrillation burden patient paroxysmal atrial fibrillation permanent pacemaker .
DOC.brief_title: Pacemaker Holter Assessment Effect BMS-914392 Atrial Fibrillation Burden
DOC.criteria: Paroxysmal atrial fibrillation ( AF ) Programmable dual chamber pacemaker appropriate arrhythmia diagnostics . 150 % AF burden pacemaker interrogation screen . Women childbearing potential ( WOCBP ) men must use acceptable method contraception avoid pregnancy . Persistent permanent AF . AF Burden < 1 % > 50 % . Current history neurological disease mental disorder . Ejection Fraction < 45 % . Severe mitral aortic valve dysfunction . TIA ( Transient Ischemic Attack ) within last 12 month . Acute coronary syndrome last 2 month . Previous AF ablation . Cardioversion last 3 month . Current kidney liver disease , current cancer . History neurological mental disorder . Major surgery within 4 week first dose ( cardiac surgery within 4 month ) . Screening lab test result outside allow limit per protocol . QTcF > 450 msec .
